controller

Class MainController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.MainController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class MainController
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
    Creates view and subcontrollers, handles events from the keyboard and implements actions from subcontrollers
    Version:
    2016-02-28
    Author:
    Ingrid, Micaela

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MainController(View view)
      Constructor that adds a reference to the view, configures the view and adds subcontrollers and starts the startup menu
